mapper.sql: id, username, password, create_time, update_time, delete_time
mapper.insert:
insert into user
id,
username,
password,
create_time,
update_time,
delete_time,
#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{deleteTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
mapper.update:
update user
username = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
delete_time = #{deleteTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update user set username = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, delete_time = #{deleteTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select count(*) from user where username = #{username}
select count(*) from user where username = #{username} and password = #{password}
